name: Bioreactor Temperature
description: Measures the temperature of the algae culture in the main bioreactor R-501. Critical for cell viability.

name: Inlet Broth Temperature
description: Monitors the temperature of the incoming sterile nutrient broth before entering the bioreactor.

name: Bioreactor Mid Temperature
description: Temperature sensor at the midpoint of the bioreactor for detecting thermal gradients.

name: Bioreactor Outlet Temperature
description: Temperature at the bioreactor discharge point where culture exits to separator.

name: Product Storage Temperature
description: Temperature of the final purified protein solution in refrigerated storage tank T-506. Must stay below 8°C.

name: Bioreactor Pressure
description: Operating pressure inside the main bioreactor R-501. High pressure triggers relief valve at 1.8 bar.

name: Separator Pressure
description: Operating pressure of the centrifugal separator S-504. Must match feed flow rate.

name: Filter Differential Pressure
description: Pressure drop across the protein filtration unit F-505 membranes. Indicates fouling level.

name: Bioreactor Level
description: Liquid level inside the main bioreactor. Below 20% causes agitator damage.

name: Culture Tank Level
description: Level in the culture holding tank upstream of the bioreactor.

name: Storage Tank Level
description: Level in the final product storage tank T-506. Above 98% causes overflow risk.

name: Bioreactor pH
description: pH level of the algae culture. Optimal range 6.5-7.1. Outside 6.2-7.4 halts metabolism.

name: Dissolved Oxygen
description: Dissolved oxygen concentration in the culture. Below 8 ppm causes anaerobic conditions.

name: Culture Density
description: Biomass concentration (cell density) in the bioreactor. Target 85 g/L for harvest.

name: Protein Purity
description: Inferred purity of the final bioluminescent protein product from online analyzer QI-401.

name: Product Concentration
description: Concentration of the purified protein in the final product stream.

name: Nutrient Feed Flow
description: Flow rate of sterile nutrient broth into the bioreactor. Controlled by FC-201.

name: Product Outlet Flow
description: Flow rate of purified protein solution to storage tank.

name: Separator Recycle Flow
description: Flow rate of recycled spent broth from separator back to nutrient preparation.

name: Light Intensity
description: Intensity of the photosynthesis lamp arrays C-503 A/B. Above 1600 causes photoinhibition.

name: Light to Feed Ratio
description: Calculated ratio of light intensity to feed flow rate. Optimal range 4.0-6.0.

name: Glucose Concentration
description: Mole percentage of glucose in the nutrient broth. Above 8% indicates nitrogen limitation.

name: Protein Molar Fraction
description: Mole percentage of target protein in the bioreactor mixture.

name: Culture Activity
description: Percentage of metabolically active cells in the bioreactor. Drop indicates stress.

name: Aeration Rate
description: Air flow rate into the bioreactor for oxygen supply.

name: Agitator Power
description: Power consumption of the bioreactor agitator motor. Above 120% indicates overload.

name: Culture Viscosity
description: Measured viscosity of the culture medium. Increases with cell density.
